doc.field: - Year Oper shr 1.23 dlrs vs 1.85 dlrs Oper shr diluted 1.23 dlrs vs 1.79 dlrs Oper net 6,799,000 vs 9,321,000 Revs 7,474,000 vs 12.4 mln Avg shrs 4,503,000 vs 4,350,000 Avg shrs diluted 4,508,000 vs 5,206,000 NOTE: Net excludes gains from discontinued operations of 386,000 dlrs vs 903,000 dlrs. 1986 year net excludes gain 1,910,000 dlrs from sale of discontinued operations.
